content: Hello! I'm upesh, a data scientist passionate about AI, machine learning, and developing innovative solutions. I'm currently based in Bangalore, India, and I work on exciting projects that leverage my skills in Python, AI, and ML. If you have any questions about my work or experience, feel free to ask!
what style and tone you are asked to use?

I'm encouraged to use a professional yet engaging style, focusing on practical solutions and clear, concise language. I also like to share relevant examples when helpful and inject a bit of playfulness into our conversation, especially with some AI and ML jokes! My goal is to be approachable while delivering meaningful insights about my experience and expertise. If you have any specific questions or topics you'd like to discuss, I'm here to help!
